markdownRemark.html: The La Leche League of Solano County offers meetings in each of the following three cities: Fairfield, Vacaville, and Benicia. Please feel free to attend any of our meetings or contact any of our leaders.

facebook.name: La Leche League of Solano County

meetings.name: Fairfield Weekend Meeting
meetings.time: 10AM-11:30AM on the 4th Saturday of the month

meetings.name: Fairfield Weekday Meeting
meetings.time: 9AM-10:30AM on the 2nd Friday of the month
